actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade

official_title: To amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit the export of refined petroleum products during a period of war or hostilities between the United States and any other country.

summary.text: Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit the export of refined petroleum products during a period of war or hostilities between the United States and another country.

titles.title: To amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit the export of refined petroleum products during a period of war or hostilities between the United States and any other country.
